ing: 1 (1 gram) packet granular sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
des: "This is our all-time favorite dressing. Uses simple ingredients that we always have on hand. It's great on simple green salads, taco salads, and even seafood salads. Also great as a burger sauce. Serve over your favorite salad greens."
ins: Stir mayonnaise, ketchup, pickle relish, lemon juice, and sweetener together in a bowl.
